divs: Sighting Detailsi don'tknow if anyone else has seen this; it seems to appear every coupleof years and i look for it...it first appears to be a bright star but then it starts pulsating and moving in different directions; tonight i got home after dark and walked across the road to get my mail i noticed it in the distance above the tree line.by the time i got into the house it had moved a distance..as i watched it from the window it just disappeared like someone turned out a light..i do think it was close enough that if it had been a plane i would have heard the engine..has anyone else seen this???
